program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, i, t, sum1, sum2, a1, a2, min_val

    character(len=1000) :: input_str

Read input

    read(*,*) n, input_str

    ! Process first part

    t = 0

    do i = 1, n

        if (input_str(i:i) /= '4' .and. input_str(i:i) /= '7') then

            t = 1

            exit

        end if

    end do

    if (t == 1) then

        first_result = 'NO'

    else

        sum1 = 0

        sum2 = 0

        do i = 1, n/2

            sum1 = sum1 + ichar(input_str(i:i)) - ichar('0')

        end do

        ! Compute start for second half

        integer :: start

        start = n - n/2 +1

        do i = start, n

            sum2 = sum2 + ichar(input_str(i:i)) - ichar('0')

        end do

        if (sum1 == sum2) then

            first_result = 'YES'

        else

            first_result = 'NO'

        end if

    end if

    ! Process second part

    second_input = first_result

    ! Process a for a1

    character(len=len_trim(second_input)) :: a, b

    a = second_input

    a1 = 0

    do i = 2, len_trim(a)

        if (a(i:i) == a(i-1:i-1)) then

            if (a(i:i) == '1') then

                a(i:i) = '0'

            else

                a(i:i) = '1'

            end if

            a1 = a1 +1

        end if

    end do

    ! Process b for a2

    b = second_input

    a2 =0

    do i = len_trim(b), 2, -1

        if (b(i:i) == b(i-1:i-1)) then

            if (b(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

                b(i-1:i-1) = '0'

            else

                b(i-1:i-1) = '1'

            end if

            a2 = a2 +1

        end if

    end do

    ! Output the minimum

    min_val = min(a1, a2)

    print *, min_val

end program main

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, i, t, sum1, sum2, a1, a2, min_val

    character(len=1000) :: input_str

    character(len=4) :: first_result

    character(len=4) :: second_input

    ! Read input

    read(*,*) n, input_str

    ! Process first part

    t = 0

    do i = 1, n

        if (input_str(i:i) /= '4' .and. input_str(i:i) /= '7') then

            t = 1

            exit

        end if

    end do

    if (t == 1) then

        first_result = 'NO'

    else

        sum1 = 0

        sum2 = 0

        do i = 1, n/2

            sum1 = sum1 + ichar(input_str(i:i)) - ichar('0')

        end do

        ! Compute start for second half

        integer :: start

        start = n - n/2 +1

        do i = start, n

            sum2 = sum2 + ichar(input_str(i:i)) - ichar('0')

        end do

        if (sum1 == sum2) then

            first_result = 'YES'

        else

            first_result = 'NO'

        end if

    end if

    ! Process second part

    second_input = first_result

    ! Process a for a1

    character(len=len_trim(second_input)) :: a, b

    a = second_input

    a1 = 0

    do i = 2, len_trim(a)

        if (a(i:i) == a(i-1:i-1)) then

            if (a(i:i) == '1') then

                a(i:i) = '0'

            else

                a(i:i) = '1'

            end if

            a1 = a1 +1

        end if

    end do

    ! Process b for a2

    b = second_input

    a2 =0

    do i = len_trim(b), 2, -1

        if (b(i:i) == b(i-1:i-1)) then

            if (b(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

                b(i-1:i-1) = '0'

            else

                b(i-1:i-1) = '1'

            end if

            a2 = a2 +1

        end if

    end do

    ! Output the minimum

    min_val = min(a1, a2)

    print *, min_val

end program main
